events.message: The policyholder submitted a claim reporting a car accident involving rear-end collision on the highway during rush hour.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords relating to vehicle collision and damage assessment.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and guide them through the next steps.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the policyholder that the case is under active review.
The claims department requested photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and a written statement from the policyholder.
The policyholder submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police accident report within the deadline.
An investigation was launched to verify the details of the accident and to assess the extent of the damage to the vehicle.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the collision details matched the claim report and damage was consistent.
A settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and rental car expenses while the customerâ€™s vehicle is being repaired.
The policyholder responded with appreciation for the swift and fair settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the service.
The insurance claim was approved formally, authorizing payment for the repairs and other related expenses as per the policy.
Payment was issued to the repair shop and rental car provider as part of the approved settlement for the auto accident claim.
The claim was closed successfully after all payments were processed and the customer confirmed that repairs were completed.
All records and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
